about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know the person behind the code
about.p1: I’m a fullstack developer with over a decade of experience building powerful, secure, and scalable web applications. I specialize in ASP.NET and Angular, delivering enterprise solutions end-to-end, from solid backend architectures to smooth, user-friendly interfaces.
about.p2: My day starts with coffee, keyboard, and terminal ready, accompanied by the unsolicited supervision of my feline coworkers: Gustavo, Gretta, Gina, and Gunter. Thanks to them, I’ve mastered the art of coding while dodging tails and paws on my desk.
about.p3: I believe a great developer not only solves problems but also anticipates future obstacles, writes maintainable code, understands the business behind the solution, and fosters collaboration in every team they join.
about.p4: Lately, I’ve been diving into Svelte, fascinated by its minimalism and how quickly it turns ideas into production-ready products.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A glimpse of the impact and quality I bring to every development

shinsekai.title: Shinsekai Online Anime Figure Store
shinsekai.desc: I designed and developed a fullstack e-commerce from scratch with ASP.NET on the backend and Angular on the frontend. The platform integrated custom JWT authentication, Stripe payments, optimized storage in SQL Server, and a complete admin panel for inventory and content management. I automated deployments and CI/CD with Azure DevOps, ensuring speed and reliability in every delivery. Although the site was taken down by the client’s decision, the code remains available in my public repository.

habituary.title: Habituary Intelligent Habit Platform (In Progress)
habituary.desc: Habituary is a modern web app to build and reinforce healthy habits with a clean, scalability-oriented architecture. Backend in ASP.NET Core following Clean Architecture principles, decoupled REST API and PostgreSQL persistence via Entity Framework. Signup and authentication through Google OAuth2.0. The Angular frontend delivers a dynamic UI with progress dashboard, profiles and visualizations (actively under development). Focused on extensibility, traceability and a solid foundation for future advanced analytics.
